briefTitle: Evaluation of the Efficacy and Safety of Indigo Naturalis Oil Extract on Psoriatic Nails
officialTitle: Evaluation of the Efficacy and Safety of Indigo Naturalis Oil Extract on Psoriatic Nails
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate efficacy and safety of indigo naturalis oil extract in treating nail psoriasis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Single-Hand Nail Psoriasis Severity Index (NAPSI)and in the Modified Target NAPSI for the Single Most Severely Affected Nail of Each Hand at Week 12.
